module.name: part_view_definition
module.name.french: Définition de la vue de la pièce
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of characterization views of a version of a part.

inscope.li: identification of a characterization of a version of a part, relevant in one or more application domains and one or more life-cycle stages.

uof.name: Part_View_Definition
uof.description: The Part_View_Definition UoF specifies the data structure to represent views of versions of parts.

ae.refpath: product_definition {product_definition.frame_of_reference -> product_definition_context product_definition_context <= application_context_element application_context_element.name = 'part definition'}

aa.refpath: product_definition product_definition.formation -> product_definition_formation {product_definition_formation.of_product -> product product <- product_related_product_category.products[i] product_related_product_category <= product_category (product_category.name='part') (product_category.name='raw material')}
